paleval 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Get HCL data for a series of hex-colors

Source: R/bloom.R
pev_data_bloom.Rd

Get HCL data for a series of hex-colors

pev_data_bloom(hex, include_cvd = TRUE, ...)

# S3 method for default
pev_data_bloom(hex, ...)

# S3 method for character
pev_data_bloom(hex, n = NULL, include_cvd = TRUE,
  ...)

# S3 method for pev_fcont
pev_data_bloom(hex, n = NULL, include_cvd = TRUE,
  ...)

# S3 method for pev_fdisc
pev_data_bloom(hex, n = NULL, include_cvd = TRUE,
  ...)

Arguments

hex

character vector of hex-colors
include_cvd

logical, indicates to include data for for color-vision deficiency
...

other args (not used)
n

integer number of colors to use for unbounded palette-functions

Value

data.frame with variables cvd, x, hex, hue, chroma, luminance

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
